metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15566 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - high.
metadata.Description: Insecure SPANK environment variable handling exists in SchedMD Slurm before 16.05.11, 17.x before 17.02.9, and 17.11.x before 17.11.0rc2, allowing privilege escalation to root during Prolog or Epilog execution.

notes.Note: msalvatore> "This issue affects all Slurm versions from 15.08.0"

criterions.comment: slurm-llnl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
